title: Strongheart Resilience
content:
Strongheart Resilience Effect You have advantage on saving throws against Poison and resistance to Poison damage. Requirements Strongheart Halfling Lvl 1

Strongheart Resilience

You have advantage on saving throws against Poison and resistance to Poison damage.

Strongheart Halfling Lvl 1

Strongheart Resilience is a Trait in Baldur's Gate 3. Features provide unique abilities or effects and can be acquired depending on the Character's Race, Class and level.

Strongheart Resilience Information
